sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SYSM1000 ( DPOB_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , SERVC_COMM_SEIL_NUM , ERY_GTWK_TOT_YN , DILNLAZ_DDUC_PAY_SUBTN_YN , WKLY_HLDY_EXTPY_PRCS_YN , WKDY_NOR_TM_CTTG_DIV_CD , WKDY_EXTNN_CTTG_DIV_CD , WKDY_NGT_CTTG_DIV_CD , PUBC_HODY_NOR_TM_CTTG_CD , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_TM_CTTG_CD , PUBC_HODY_NOR_MRK_DIV_CD , WKDY_EXTNN_MRK_DIV_CD , WKDY_NGT_MRK_DIV_CD , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_MRK_DIV_CD , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_MRK_CD , PUBC_HODY_NGT_MRK_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #emymtDivCd# , #servcCommSeilNum# , #eryGtwkTotYn# , #dilnlazDducPaySubtnYn# , #wklyHldyExtpyPrcsYn# , #wkdyNorTmCttgDivCd# , #wkdyExtnnCttgDivCd# , #wkdyNgtCttgDivCd# , #pubcHodyNorTmCttgCd# , #pubcHodyExtnnTmCttgCd# , #pubcHodyNorMrkDivCd# , #wkdyExtnnMrkDivCd# , #wkdyNgtMrkDivCd# , #wkdyNorDutyMrkDivCd# , #pubcHodyExtnnMrkCd# , #pubcHodyNgtMrkDivCd# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SYSM1000 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# , SERVC_COMM_SEIL_NUM=#servcCommSeilNum# , ERY_GTWK_TOT_YN=#eryGtwkTotYn# , DILNLAZ_DDUC_PAY_SUBTN_YN=#dilnlazDducPaySubtnYn# , WKLY_HLDY_EXTPY_PRCS_YN=#wklyHldyExtpyPrcsYn# , WKDY_NOR_TM_CTTG_DIV_CD=#wkdyNorTmCttgDivCd# , WKDY_EXTNN_CTTG_DIV_CD=#wkdyExtnnCttgDivCd# , WKDY_NGT_CTTG_DIV_CD=#wkdyNgtCttgDivCd# , PUBC_HODY_NOR_TM_CTTG_CD=#pubcHodyNorTmCttgCd# , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_TM_CTTG_CD=#pubcHodyExtnnTmCttgCd# , PUBC_HODY_NOR_MRK_DIV_CD=#pubcHodyNorMrkDivCd# , WKDY_EXTNN_MRK_DIV_CD=#wkdyExtnnMrkDivCd# , WKDY_NGT_MRK_DIV_CD=#wkdyNgtMrkDivCd# , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_MRK_DIV_CD=#wkdyNorDutyMrkDivCd# , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_MRK_CD=#pubcHodyExtnnMrkCd# , PUBC_HODY_NGT_MRK_DIV_CD=#pubcHodyNgtMrkDivCd# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# AND SERVC_COMM_SEIL_NUM=#servcCommSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM SYSM1000 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# AND SERVC_COMM_SEIL_NUM=#servcCommSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , SERVC_COMM_SEIL_NUM , ERY_GTWK_TOT_YN , DILNLAZ_DDUC_PAY_SUBTN_YN , WKLY_HLDY_EXTPY_PRCS_YN , WKDY_NOR_TM_CTTG_DIV_CD , WKDY_EXTNN_CTTG_DIV_CD , WKDY_NGT_CTTG_DIV_CD , PUBC_HODY_NOR_TM_CTTG_CD , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_TM_CTTG_CD , PUBC_HODY_NOR_MRK_DIV_CD , WKDY_EXTNN_MRK_DIV_CD , WKDY_NGT_MRK_DIV_CD , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_MRK_DIV_CD , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_MRK_CD , PUBC_HODY_NGT_MRK_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM SYSM1000 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# AND SERVC_COMM_SEIL_NUM=#servcCommSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , SERVC_COMM_SEIL_NUM , ERY_GTWK_TOT_YN , DILNLAZ_DDUC_PAY_SUBTN_YN , WKLY_HLDY_EXTPY_PRCS_YN , WKDY_NOR_TM_CTTG_DIV_CD , WKDY_EXTNN_CTTG_DIV_CD , WKDY_NGT_CTTG_DIV_CD , PUBC_HODY_NOR_TM_CTTG_CD , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_TM_CTTG_CD , PUBC_HODY_NOR_MRK_DIV_CD , WKDY_EXTNN_MRK_DIV_CD , WKDY_NGT_MRK_DIV_CD , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_MRK_DIV_CD , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_MRK_CD , PUBC_HODY_NGT_MRK_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM SYSM1000 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EMYMT_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EMYMT_DIV_CD DESC , SERVC_COMM_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM SYSM1000 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EMYMT_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
